# R as an Oversized Calculator: the Console {.tabset}

## Getting started

You need to have the packages *learnr* and *devtools* installed. If you haven't so you can do this with
```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("learnr")
install.packages("devtools")
```

Please install the following R-package from my Github account:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("clausrueffler/CodingWithR.exercises")
```

Next, you have to run
```{r eval=FALSE}
learnr::run_tutorial("learnr-demo", "CodingWithR.exercises")
```
